welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Vega Alta, Puerto Rico! Known for its stunning beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and savor all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Isla Grande Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luis Munoz Marin International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luis Munoz Marin International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arecibo Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Arecibo Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
